nodes.text: Bren Harvist was a Rebel commander who was stationed on Endor after the Battle of Endor. He was in command of the Rebel commando group Recon-A who had been assigned to an Ewok village to help its inhabitants recover from the Battle of Endor. As the village was assaulted by a group of abandoned Imperials, Harvist and his men and their Ewok allies defended the village.
